escapeHatch.subtitle: Channel Info & Unilateral Channel Close
escapeHatch.assetSafetyDescription: Your assets are safe. They are secured by your commitment transaction. By broadcasting the commitment transaction, you can reclaim your funds at any time without third-party permission.
escapeHatch.noChannelDescription: You have no channel. Please create a channel first.
escapeHatch.closeChannelNote: Close Channel: Incurs on-chain gas; reopening costs 3,000 sats again

nodeSetting.title: Node Settings
nodeSetting.description: Configure and join the SatoshiNet node network to participate in consensus and rewards by staking assets.
nodeSetting.confirmCoreDescription: Are you sure you want to become a core node?
nodeSetting.confirmMinerDescription: Are you sure you want to become a regular mining node?
nodeSetting.confirmDescription: This action will trigger an on-chain staking transaction!
nodeSetting.guideText:
Join the SatoshiNet and help build the foundational infrastructure for BTC assetization.
Two types of nodes are currently open for participation:

1. Standard Mining Node: Lightweight & Open to All

◆ Stake $PEARL only — no GPU or ASIC required
◆ Hardware: 4-core CPU / 8GB RAM / 100GB SSD
◆ Syncs with core nodes and joins PoS mining
◆ No indexer required — fast deployment, low maintenance

2. Core Node: Powering Native BTC Infrastructure

◆ Runs both BTC mainnet node and full SatoshiNet node
◆ Provides open API services (transaction indexing, channel access)
◆ Supports asset protocols (ORDX, Runes, etc.)
◆ Hardware: 16-core CPU / 64GB RAM / 2TB SSD + high-speed network

assetOperationDialog.confirmOperation: Are you sure you want to proceed with this operation?
assetOperationDialog.withdrawalFeeInfo: Withdrawal fee: 2000 sats service fee + miner fee (~300 sats, network-based)
assetOperationDialog.unlockNotice: ⚠️ Unlock Notice: When unlocking to SatoshiNet, 3000 sats will be reserved to cover potential commitment transaction (unilateral exit) fees.
assetOperationDialog.taprootError: ❌ Non-Taproot Address Not Supported: This wallet only supports sending to Taproot addresses (P2TR).
